function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor air quality in homes","Impact":"Negative impact on residents' health and well-being","Mitigation":"Use of air purifiers, ventilation systems, and monitoring of air quality","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Residents","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"},{"Description":"Lack of access to natural light","Impact":"Negative impact on residents' mental health","Mitigation":"Use of larger windows, skylights, and interior design to maximize natural light","Technologies":"Large windows, skylights","People":"Residents","Owner":"Architects, builders"},{"Description":"Limited outdoor spaces","Impact":"Negative impact on residents' well-being and mental health","Mitigation":"Incorporation of balconies, green spaces, and outdoor sports areas in building design","Technologies":"Balcony design, landscaping","People":"Residents","Owner":"Architects, developers"}]}
